title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.11 - Posting of race results
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.11 - Posting of race results

State Regulations
(a) An
authorized pari-mutuel wagering entity shall submit to the commission for
approval a plan for providing live and simulcast race results to the wagering
public. The plan must include: (1)
methods by
which the results will be provided; (2)
types of results to be provided; and
(3)
the retention period for
public availability of race results. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4300.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
